abstract: Members of University of Iowa women’s field hockey team file complaint with federal Education Department claiming that firing of coach Tracey Griesbaum was part of pattern of discrimination against female coaches.
lead_paragraph: Four members of Iowa’s women’s field hockey team have filed a gender-bias complaint with the federal Education Department over the firing of their coach.

headline.main: Field Hockey Players File Gender-Bias Complaint

snippet: Four members of Iowa’s women’s field hockey team have filed a gender-bias complaint with the federal Education Department over the firing of their coach.
